original_text: Then the priests killed the goats as a sin offering. They offered their blood on the altar as a sacrifice. Then all the people of Israel would no longer be guilty for their sins. This was because the king had said that the burnt offerings and the sin offerings would be for all Israel.
korean_text: 제사장들이 잡아 그 피를 속죄제로 삼아 제단에 드려 온 이스라엘을 위하여 속죄하니 이는 왕이 명령하여 온 이스라엘을 위하여 번제와 속죄제를 드리게 하였음이더라
